item.title: About
item.description: About me Hi, I’m Alek. I am a sociologist, strategist and digital activist. I am the Strategy Director of Open Future Foundation, which I co-founded with Paul Keller in 2020. Our foundation is a think tank for the open movement. I am also on the Board of Creative Commons, and on the Council of Centrum Cyfrowe. I have also co-founded Communia, the European Association for the Digital Public Domain, and KOED, the Polish coalition for open education.
